reviewText: I always have used Body Focus work out videos andd they really seem to bring me results fast! I love it.

I first bought this back in the '90's when it came out.  I used it personally, and at work in a mental health clinic with my clients.  Now all these years later, I use it in my Special Education Classroom.  The students love the exercise routine, and get a terrific workout! (as do the adults in the classroom)
